thread.title: Rita Heilman

author: Rita Heilman
title: Rita Heilman
text:
I have purchased items 2 different times, I was happy with most of the items I ordered, I LOVE sour candy and I really LOVE Trolli brand,#1. but the one item I ordered of Trolli was labeled "Sour" but IT WAS NOT SOUR! it was just some sugar on the candy, I was disappointed it that purchase.
#2. I thought I was getting a good deal with buying the large packs but it is cheaper to buy most of the products in your local stores.
